Articles.Content:
I was most of the way through exporting a new version of my "Frog" upper stage to unity, and I finally got the RCS set up what I think is correctly.

Anyway, as I was about to export, when I hit either 'r' or 'ctrl+r', and all the arrows on the game objects turned into square, and I can't export. I'm thinking I somehow got into a re-scale mode??:confused:

How do I undo this, or do I have to set up the whole RCS system again?
Never mind. After a few minutes of panicking, I figured it out.
